_header: Saint Faith that holy maid of swith high men she came
Note: For a wholly different text in one MS see 2229.
Subjects: saints’ lives; Faith, saint, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, ff. 201-202: prose.
_description: Life of St. Faith in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte fei þe holi maide of suyþe heie men comSwiþe
                    ȝong In hire child hod heo turnde to cristendom…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou seynt Fei & hire felawes our ernde beode soþat
                    we mote to þe Ioie come þat hi beþ Inne ido

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEinte Fey þat holie maide of swiþe heiȝe men heo
                    comSwiþe ȝong in hire childhod heo turnede to
                    cristindom…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nou Seinte fey and hire felawes ore erinde beode soÞat
                    we moten to þe Ioye come þare huy beoth inne ido
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 83-6.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayn fayth þe holy maiden of hye kyn che comTill che was
                    ȝong inchylded che turnd to cristindomAnd lyfed holi lyfe inogh hyr
                    worde sprong full wydeOf hir godenes & hiir lyfyng about on ilc a
                    syde…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Sayn faith & þi felawes all to god for vs ȝe
                    prayÞat blis vs grant þat ȝe are ine at oure endyng
                    day

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint ffey þe holy mayde of swiþe heye men comSwiþe
                    ȝong in hure chilhold ȝeo turnde to cristendom…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Seint ffey and hure ffelawes oure erande beode soÞat
                    we mote to þe ioye come þat hi beoþ ynne ydo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint fey þe holy mayde of wel hey men comeswyþe
                    ȝonge in hure childhod heo turnede to cristendom…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…To þe Ioie of heuene þe saules alle wendeNow god
                    lene þat we mote oure synnes here amende

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin fei þe holi maide of suiþe hei men comsuide ȝong in here childhod heo torneþe to cristendom…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou sein fey & hire felaues our herande beþe soþat we mote to þe ioie come þat hi beþ Inne ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxvi” added to right margin by later hand (f. 146).

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin fey þe holy maide of swuþe hiȝe men comSwuþe ȝong in hure childhod heo turnde to cristendom…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou seinte fey and hure felawes our erende bidde soþat we mote to þe ioie come þat hi beoþ Inne ido

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt feye þat holy mayde of swiþe heyȝe men com…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Now seynte feyþe & her felawes vr herende bede alsoþat we mote to þat ioiȝe come þat hii beþ inne ydo

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt ffey þe holy mayde of wel hegh men comeSwiþe
                    ȝonge in hir childhede she turned to cristendome…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…To þe ioye of heuen here soules all did wendeNow god
                    graunte þat we mote oure soules here amende Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt feiþ þe holy maide of swich hie men comeRight
                    ȝong in hur childhode she turned to cristendome…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now seint Feiþ and hire felowes our erand bede
                    soÞat we mote come to þat blisse which þei ben Inne
                    do
